attributes.action: make funding available by Health Commission for Wales for the drug Campath for RRMS sufferers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heard of a lady who suffers from RRMS who lives in Wales but is treated in England by her Neurologist.  She was started on the drug Copaxone but was allergic to this and her Neuro then recommended Campath or Tysabri, the Neuro opted for Campath but funding was refused for this by the Health Commission for Wales.  She then had to apply to a Charitable Fund in the hospital who then granted this.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive / Welsh Assembly / Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
